newsitem.title: USA: Performance Food Cracker pact extended.
newsitem.headline: Performance Food Cracker pact extended.

text.p: Performance Food Group Co said Monday it has extended its food service distribution contract with Cracker Barrel Old Country Stores Inc.

The company, which has been the primary supplier of food service products to Cracker Barrel since 1975, said its total services to Cracker Barrel produced $195.3 million, or 29 percent, of its 1995 net sales.
It provided no further details on the contract.
